Miu

Korean: 미우

Nagoya, Aichi

Sakurai Miu

Birthday:
Jan 11, 2002

Height:
5'4" (162 cm)
Group (2023-present):
ME:I

Introduction

Miu is a Japanee singer under LAPONE Entertainment. In 2023, she participated in the survival show "Produce 101 Japan: The Girls" where she ended up ranking 4th place, securing her spot as a member of the Japanese project girl group ME:I.

In 2020, she appeared as a contestant on the survival show Nizi Project. She was eliminated in the Part.1 and in 2021, she appeared as a contestant on the survival show Girls Planet 999. She was eliminated in episode 9 after ranking J11.
